code:
flowchart TD
    A[Infra_WorkerNode] --> B{Infra_EtcdCluster}
    
    B -->|"üéµ Voice"| C[Infra_EtcdCluster]
    B -->|"üìù Text"| D[Infra_RedisCache]
    B -->|"üñºÔ∏è Image"| E[Infra_IngressController]
    B -->|"üé• Video"| F[Infra_EtcdCluster]
    
    C --> G[Infra_RedisCache]
    D --> G
    E --> G
    F --> G
    
    G --> H[Infra_EtcdCluster]
    H --> I[Infra_LoadBalancer]
    I --> J[Infra_IngressController]
    J --> K[Infra_RedisCache]
    
    K --> L{Infra_EtcdCluster}
    L -->|"üîä Voice"| M[Infra_RedisCache]
    L -->|"üé® Visual"| N[Infra_RedisCache]
    L -->|"üìù Text"| O[Infra_IngressController]
    L -->|"üìä Data"| P[Infra_IngressController]
    
    M --> Q[Infra_WorkerNode]
    N --> Q
    O --> Q
    P --> Q
    
    %% Real-time feedback loop
    Q -.->|"üìä Performance metrics"| H
    Q -.->|"üîÑ User feedback"| G
    
    %% Parallel processing indicators
    J -.->|"üîß Tool 1"| J1[Infra_WorkerNode]
    J -.->|"üîß Tool 2"| J2[Infra_LoadBalancer]
    J -.->|"üîß Tool 3"| J3[Infra_RedisCache]
    
    J1 --> K
    J2 --> K
    J3 --> K
    
    %% Styling
    style A fill:#e1f5fe,stroke:#0277bd,stroke-width:3px

    style D fill:#e3f2fd,stroke:#1565c0,stroke-width:1px
    style E fill:#e3f2fd,stroke:#1565c0,stroke-width:1px
    style F fill:#e3f2fd,stroke:#1565c0,stroke-width:1px
    
    %% Output generation styling

    style O fill:#e0f2e1,stroke:#2e7d32,stroke-width:1px
